title: Installation issue: pkgconfig

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I really don't know enough about `ld`, but is spack meant to be using the system `ld`, or one that it builds/provides itself?

Anyway: this worked as

```
spack install openmpi@3.1.4 %gcc@8.3.0
spack install openmpi@3.1.4 %intel@19.0.3 ^rdma-core%gcc@8.3.0
```

And is only failing with pgi.

```
spack install openmpi@3.1.4 %pgi@19.4
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openmpi@3.1.4 %pgi@19.4
```
